resources.string: Welcome to the Home Screen\nSelect An Item From the Nav Bar to get Started

This application is a feature test to showcase the functionality of certain design features.

This application contains a bottom navigation bar on the main activity

A navigation bar and floating action button on ther maps activity.

Additionally, the user can use the search bar to pan the map to different locations and add markers for several locations.

This page is used to contain this information and to add a destination for the bottom navigation bar.
